JOB RESPONSIBILITIES: Manages projects with timely deadlines.Write clear, concise and well documented code.Communicates frequently with management; detailing progress on the development effort.Evaluates and implements changes to tools and modules based on the needs of the client.
GENDER: Both males and females are allowed to apply
EDUCATIONAL REQUIREMENTS: Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computer Science, Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computer Engineering
ADDITIONAL REQUIREMENTS:
Age at least 25 years 
Both males and females are allowed to apply
3+ years of experience as an iOS developer.Experience with real-time chat application and integration of socket.ioProficiency in Java, Swift and Objective-C.Experienced in developing customer-facing, commercial iOS applications.Deep understanding of iOS frameworks such as Core Data and Core Animation, along with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning.Knowledgeable in consuming RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services.Experience with large e-commerce web sites is desirable.Deep understanding of IOS UI frameworks application design, and complex, reactive touch-based UIsProficient in GUI programming and multithreaded applicationsProficient in gitPortfolio of apps developed must be provided
